org.mobicents.slee.runtime.activity
Class ActivityContextFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.mobicents.slee.container.AbstractSleeContainerModule
      org.mobicents.slee.runtime.activity.ActivityContextFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActivityContextFactory, SleeContainerModule
public class ActivityContextFactoryImpl
extends AbstractSleeContainerModule
implements ActivityContextFactory

Activity context factory -- return an activity context given an activity or create one and put it in the table. This also implements the activity context naming facility for the SLEE.

Version:
2.0
Author:
F.Moggia, M. Ranganathan, Tim Fox, eduardomartins second version

getActivityContext

public ActivityContextImpl getActivityContext(ActivityContextHandle ach,
                                              boolean updateLastAccessTime)
Description copied from interface: ActivityContextFactory
Retrieves the ActivityContext for the specified ActivityContextHandle.

Specified by:
getActivityContext in interface ActivityContextFactory
updateLastAccessTime - indicates if an update of last access time is needed. Note that this doesn't mean an update will be done, it may depend if activity idleness checks are on, the activity type or simply when last update was done.
Returns:
null if no such activity context exists
